effect.sun_moon: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.

short_effect.sun_moon: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
